HOUSE_OWNER_NAME = #{houseOwnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUSE_OWNER_ID_TYPE = #{houseOwnerIdType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOUSE_OWNER_ID_NO = #{houseOwnerIdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUSE_OWNER_MOBILE = #{houseOwnerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REJECT_REASON = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REJECT_REASON_TYPE = #{rejectReasonType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONFIRM_TIME = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APPROVAL_TIME = #{approvalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CANCEL_TIME = #{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FINISH_TIME = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REJECT_TIME = #{rejectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AGENCY_FEE = #{agencyFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NATION = #{nation,jdbcType=CHAR},
HKADR = #{hkadr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDITIONAL_TERMS = #{additionalTerms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGT_COM_NAME = #{agtComName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGT_ADDRESS = #{agtAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGT_COM_TEL = #{agtComTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROXY_ATT_ID = #{proxyAttId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_IDENTITY = #{createUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_FLG = #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOUSE_STRUCTURE = #{houseStructure,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROPERTY_ID_NO = #{propertyIdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

C.ID, C.HID, C.NO, C.STATUS, C.RENTAL_MODE, C.LEASE_PURPOSE, C.LEASE_DOMAIN, C.LEASE_AREA, C.LEASE_TERM_YEAR, C.LEASE_TERM_MONTH, C.START_TIME, C.END_TIME, C.LESSEE_PID, C.LESSEE_NAME, C.LESSEE_ID_TYPE, C.LESSEE_ID_NO, C.LESSEE_MOBILE, C.MONTHLY_RENT, C.SETTLEMENT_CYCLE, C.PAY_TIME_MONTH, C.PAY_TIME_DAY, C.OWNER_BEAR, C.OWNER_BEAR_OTHER, C.DEPOSIT_AMT, C.PAYMENT_METHOD, C.LESSOR_PID, C.LESSOR_NAME, C.LESSOR_ID_TYPE, C.LESSOR_ID_NO, C.LESSOR_MOBILE, C.HOUSE_ADDR, C.PROPERTY_TYPE, C.HOUSE_TYPE, C.BUILDING_AREA, C.HOUSE_OWNER_PID, C.HOUSE_OWNER_NAME, C.HOUSE_OWNER_ID_TYPE, C.HOUSE_OWNER_ID_NO, C.HOUSE_OWNER_MOBILE, C.REJECT_REASON_TYPE, C.REJECT_REASON, C.AGENT_STATUS, C.SEND_TIME, C.CONFIRM_TIME, C.REJECT_TIME, C.PAY_DEPOSIT_TIME, C.FINISH_TIME, C.DISS_AGR_TIME, C.APPROVE_REJECT_TIME, C.APPROVAL_TIME, C.DEPOSIT_CLAIM_TIME, C.CANCEL_TIME, C.RENEWAL_FLG, C.RENEWAL_CID, C.CREATE_USER, C.CREATE_TIME, C.MODIFY_USER, C.MODIFY_TIME, C.DELETE_FLG, C.VERSION, C.EID, C.BEID, C.HAS_INSURANCE, C.ADDITIONAL_TERMS, C.LESSEE_ADDRESS, C.LESSEE_EMAIL, C.LESSEE_BACKUP_TEL, C.LESSEE_BACKUP_NAME, C.LESSEE_IDS, C.LESSEE_IDS_OTHER, C.LESSOR_ADDRESS, C.LESSOR_EMAIL, C.LESSOR_BACKUP_NAME, C.LESSOR_BACKUP_TEL, C.LESSOR_MOBILE, C.LESSOR_IDS, C.LESSOR_IDS_OTHER, C.STAGES, C.AGENCY_FEE
mapper.select: SELECT , D.NO AS DNO, D.status AS DSTATUS, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'settlement_cycle' AND CODE = C.SETTLEMENT_CYCLE) SETTLEMENT_CYCLE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'per_id_type' AND CODE = C.LESSEE_ID_TYPE) LESSEE_ID_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'per_id_type' AND CODE = C.LESSOR_ID_TYPE) LESSOR_ID_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_mode' AND CODE = C.RENTAL_MODE) RENTAL_MODE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'rental_purpose' AND CODE = C.LEASE_PURPOSE) LEASE_PURPOSE_NAME, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE TYPE = 'property_id_type' AND CODE = C.PROPERTY_TYPE) HOU_PROPERTY_NAME FROM CON_CONTRACT C LEFT JOIN HOU_HOUSE_INFO H ON C.HID = H.ID LEFT JOIN HOU_LEASE_INFO L ON L.HID = H.ID LEFT JOIN CON_DEPOSIT D ON D.CID = C.ID WHERE C.ID = #{id}

select
distinct
from con_contract
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM CON_CONTRACT WHERE STATUS != 8 AND STATUS != 11 AND EID = #{value}

SELECT
FROM CON_CONTRACT_V2 WHERE EID = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS = 13 AND DELETE_FLG = 0 ORDER BY MODIFY_TIME DESC limit #{beginPos,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
FROM CON_CONTRACT_V2 WHERE EID = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS = 13 AND DELETE_FLG = 0
